title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, December 8, 2021
description: The Roman lyric poet, and soldier, Horace was born on this day 65BCE He lived during the time of Caesar Augustus (Octavian), writing his Odes on many topics.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
